title: My Projects
description: What i've worked on and what i've learned in the process
paragraph1: Here i will be showing some of the projects i have worked on. Some of them will be personal projects and others professional projects. I will be adding more projects over time, so stay tuned. For now, the only project i have is my portfolio, but i am working on a project with a public API that i hope to have ready soon.

project1.title: My Portfolio
project1.description: This is my personal portfolio, where I showcase my skills and projects.
project1.content: It was built using Angular and TypeScript, and it is fully responsive. I used the Transloco library for translations, which allows me to easily add new languages in the futureHere. I have utilized many of Angular's features, such as routing, signals, dependency injection, and components. I styled the components using pure CSS and decided to host it on GitHub Pages, which is a free hosting service provided by GitHub. I also used Angular CLI to create the project and manage its dependencies.
